plot outline: Vir is a bachelor from a small town working as a sous-chef in a five-star hotel in Mumbai. A handsome, charming, macho idiot who flirts with, yearns for and lusts after any woman who is friendly but seems unattainable. From his man-hating maid, whom he ogles as she wipes his floor, to the man-eating call center owner who could wipe the floor with him...from the too-tall model to the too-young pretty pest down the corridor...from the Bengali-Beauty-with-Brains-and-Books to the born-flirt next door - Vir is suckered by them all. Ego, Confusion, Commitment...it's so difficult to stop flattering and lying - to himself! The sometimes smart and sometimes silly observations of his all-male gang of cooks at the hotel kitchen is of little help until... Vir, an especially overconfident (and thus entertaining) specimen of the male species, is forced to grow up.
title: Love Khichdi
plot: A talented Sous-Chef woos a variety of women with a view of using them to try and fulfill his dream.

Quite fluent in English, Chandigarh-born Vir Pratap Singh re-locates to Mumbai, and works as a Sous-Chef with Leena Grand Hotel. He lives in Khar and is friendly with his neighbors, which include Sandhya Iyengar, who also works in the same hotel as a Receptionist; Parminder Kaur - who likes Italian food; schoolgirl Deepti J. Mehta - who has a crush on him; and his maidservant, Shanta Bhansode. In the hotel lobby, he woos bookshop manager, Sharmishta Basu; attempts to strike a friendship with leggy model Susan Raj; and befriends and beds businesswoman Nafisa Khan with hopes of getting her to invest in his dream of running his own restaurant. He permits each woman to think that they know him well and lets them guess his Sun Sign. When he feels the time is right, he decides to make his move of using one of the women for fulfilling his dream - little realizing the shocks and disappointments that await him.::rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)
